dimension: 8 7/8 x 11 3/8 x 1/4 in. (22.54 x 28.89 x 0.64 cm) (without straps)
title: Bag
description: rectangular beaded panel backed with thin hide panel; two thin loop straps; geometric beadwork in block and diamond designs with pink ground
